title: Cups to Milliliters Converter (US, Legal & Metric) | CalcDomain

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: US Customary Cup to Milliliters: $1 \text{ US Customary Cup} = 236.5882365 \text{ mL}$ US Legal Cup to Milliliters: $1 \text{ US Legal Cup} = 240 \text{ mL}$ Metric Cup to Milliliters: $1 \text{ Metric Cup} = 250 \text{ mL}$
